meanings.definition: A person who is considered attractive and causes romantic feelings in others.
meanings.sent1: In the movie, the handsome actor played the role of the heartthrobs.
meanings.sent2: Teenagers often have posters of their favorite heartthrobs on their walls.
meanings.sent3: At the school dance, all the girls were swooning over the heartthrobs.
meanings.sent4: The charming singer became the heartthrobs of millions of fans worldwide.
meanings.sent5: The heartthrobs in the romantic novel made the readers' hearts flutter with excitement.

meanings.definition: To have a crush on someone.
meanings.sent1: She heartthrobs her classmate who sits next to her in math class.
meanings.sent2: Ever since she saw him perform, she heartthrobs the lead singer of the band.
meanings.sent3: Even though it's just a silly crush, she heartthrobs the barista at the coffee shop.
meanings.sent4: He heartthrobs his favorite actress and dreams of meeting her one day.
meanings.sent5: Despite her friends teasing her, she heartthrobs the new guy at work.
